lines: 1. Nsovo Wa Hosi Voninga, Wu Huma E-Tilweni,
U HI Nyiketile Ntirho, Wo Voninga Misava.
Pfurhisani Timboningo, Voningani, Makorhwen, Wo Hela Ntamu Elwandle, Leswaku A Ta Pona.
2. I Munyama Wa Vudyoho, Ku HUnga Na Xidzedze,
Khale Hi Rindzele Ntsena, Timboni Hlalukweni.
3. Pfurhisani Timboningo, Ku Nga Va Na Vatluti, Lava Lavaka Hlaluko,
